results.title: Diabetic kidney disease in patients with type 2 diabetes mellitus: a cross-sectional study
results.text_hl: The use of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ and RAAS blocker was negatively associated with the presence of @<m>DISEASE_Albuminuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000419 @@@albuminuria@@@ (beta coefficient: - 0.6 and -0.33, respectively; p < 0.01).

results.title: Therapeutic efficacy and safety of initial triple combination of metformin, sitagliptin, and lobeglitazone in drug-naive patients with type 2 diabetes: initial triple study
results.text_hl: In the conventional group, if the HbA1c level was >8.0% at 2 and 5 months, the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ dose was increased by 25%-50% or the @CHEMICAL_glimepiride @CHEMICAL_MESH:C057619 @@@glimepiride@@@ dose was increased by 25%-50% if the @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ dose exceeded 2000 mg/day.

citations.NLM: Lim S, Ku EJ, Lee SY, Lee JH, Lee JE, Kim KM, Davies MJ. Therapeutic efficacy and safety of initial triple combination of metformin, sitagliptin, and lobeglitazone in drug-naive patients with type 2 diabetes: initial triple study BMJ Open Diabetes Res Care. 2020 Jan;8(1):. results.title: Metformin arrests the progression of established kidney disease in the subtotal nephrectomy model of chronic kidney disease.
results.text_hl: However, after 120 days, Nx @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ that had been treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ displayed significant reductions in @<m>DISEASE_Albuminuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000419 @@@albuminuria@@@ levels and in markers of @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@renal fibrosis@@@.

results.title: Metformin modulates apoptosis and cell signaling of human podocytes under high glucose conditions.
results.text_hl: High-@CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ modulates @GENE_PRKAB1 @GENE_5564 @@@AMP-activated protein kinase@@@ (@GENE_PRKAB1 @GENE_5564 @@@AMPK@@@) signaling and cell apoptosis. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ has been demonstrated to reduce apoptosis and @<m>DISEASE_Albuminuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000419 @@@albuminuria@@@ in @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@.

results.title: Metformin monotherapy for type 2 diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: OBJECTIVES: To assess the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ monotherapy on mortality, morbidity, quality of life, glycaemic control, body weight, @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ levels, blood pressure, insulinaemia, and @<m>DISEASE_Albuminuria</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000419 @@@albuminuria@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@.
